text: napurak kirima kisima nabivarayekuta ayat dæyak nova. kavurun ho napurak kalahot ohu ema napura kala vastuvada, viniscaya dinadi (taman samaga) gena ennata sidu vanu æta. pasuva sæma atmayakatama (e) e dæya kala papayanta (sarilana phalavipaka) purana vasayen denu læbe. eva (kala pin adu kara ho papayan vædi kara ho) asadharanayak karanu nolæbe
